EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**Invite to Step Forward Assessment**
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
We'd like to invite you to our final assessment for Step Forward 2016/17:
Date: Tuesday 12th July 2016 Time: 5.15pm - 8.30pm
There are limited spaces so please click here to book your place today!
At this session, you will be interviewed by our Step Forward staff and will also have the opportunity to be assessed on the pathways that you are interested in. You can choose:
Accounting Business Administration IT Social Media & Digital Marketing Early Years Education Hospitality
Address: Step Forward Training Centre, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ (near Waterloo Station)
Once we have received your confirmation that you can attend, we will send you an email containing important information on your assessment session. Please read this carefully.
We look forward to meeting you!
In the meantime, feel free to check out our blog where you'll also find hints, tips and stories. Enjoy!
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
www.stepforward.uk.com
